title: Supergravity M5-branes wrapped on Riemann surfaces and their QFT duals
abstract: We find solutions of 11-dimensional supergravity for M5-branes wrapped on Riemann surfaces. These solutions preserve ${\cal N} = 2$ four-dimensional supersymmetry. They are dual to ${\cal N} = 2$ gauge theories, including non-conformal field theories. We work out the case of ${\cal N} = 2$ Yang-Mills in detail.
